info.description: Reference for the Brightcove CMS API, used to access and manage your media library. To test API requests, you can use our [API Testing Tools](https://support.brightcove.com/developer-tools-and-concepts). For permissions needed for OAuth credentials, see [API Operations](https://support.brightcove.com/api-operations-client-credentials-requests).
info.title: Brightcove CMS API
